metadata.description: Vendor-specific parameter configurations for the decision tree

bullseye.name: Bullseye Glass
bullseye.description: COE90 glass with cascade support - uses dual threshold logic

metadata.notes: Uses 5-step cascade algorithm. 2 Half Sheets = 1 Full (3mm only).

oceanside.name: Oceanside Glass
oceanside.description: COE96 glass with simpler single-threshold logic

metadata.notes: Single threshold - order if below 0.35yr. Can zero 24x24 (5.9% of sales).

cdv.name: Color De Verre
cdv.description: Casting molds with round-to-5 ordering logic

metadata.notes: All orders must be multiples of 5. Add 10 units if zero stock. Dragonfly mold exception: always 100.

special_rules.name: round_to_five
special_rules.description: All order quantities must be multiples of 5

special_rules.name: zero_stock_bonus
special_rules.description: Add 10 units when stock is zero

metadata.notes: Generic configuration for testing and new vendors

threshold_years.label: Order Decision Threshold
threshold_years.description: Years in Stock below this triggers order consideration

target_years.label: Order Target Level
target_years.description: Target inventory level to reach when ordering

lean_threshold.label: Lean Inventory Alert
lean_threshold.description: Years in Stock below this is critically low

allow_cascade.label: Cascade Logic Enabled
allow_cascade.description: Whether to check cutting opportunities before ordering

rounding_method.label: Rounding Method
rounding_method.description: How to round calculated quantities (ceil, floor, round)

rounding_multiple.label: Rounding Multiple
rounding_multiple.description: Round to nearest multiple of this value
